name: Fury Of The Fireman
description:
Fury of the Fireman is an isometric shoot 'em up game that is focused on wreaking havoc on the city. Burning buildings will bring out a big boom boom while firefighters will only poof.

Controls:
WASD - Player Movement
Left Shift - Run
Left Click - Flamethrower
Escape - Pause

Assets used: CITY package, Farland Skies - Cloudy Crown, Stylized Astronaut.
Music by Infraction.
Sound effects from freesound.org.
